Author: GitHub
Description:
Meet Plan Mode, a new way to work with GitHub Copilot in VS Code. Before you write any code, Copilot will ask clarifying questions to help you build a step-by-step approach. This process helps you spot gaps and potential issues early, leading to better code faster.

#PlanMode #GitHubCopilot #GitHub

Stay up-to-date on all things GitHub by connecting with us:

About GitHub It’s where over 100 million developers create, share, and ship the best code possible. It’s a place for anyone, from anywhere, to build anything—it’s where the world builds software. https://github.com
Title: Introducing Plan Mode: build better plans with GitHub Copilot
